title: 2016 Norwegian First Division
text:
The 2016 <a href="1.%20divisjon">1. divisjon</a> (referred to as OBOS-ligaen for sponsorship reasons) was a <a href="Norway">Norwegian</a> second-tier <a href="association%20football">football</a> league season. The league was contested by 16 teams, and the top two teams were promoted to <a href="Tippeligaen">Tippeligaen</a>, while the teams placed from third to sixth place played a promotion-playoff against the 14th-placed team in Tippeligaen to win promotion. The bottom four teams were be relegated to the <a href="2.%20divisjon">2. divisjon</a>.
The first round of the season was played on 9 April 2016 and the season concluded with the last round on 30 October 2016. The playoff-tournament was played between 6 and 21 November 2016.
Team changes from 2015.
In the <a href="2015%201.%20divisjon">2015 1. divisjon</a>, <a href="Sogndal%20Fotball">Sogndal</a>, and <a href="SK%20Brann">Brann</a> won promotion to Tippeligaen, while <a href="Follo%20FK">Follo</a>, <a href="Nest-Sotra%20Fotball">Nest-Sotra</a>, <a href="B%C3%A6rum%20SK">Bærum</a> and <a href="H%C3%B8nefoss%20BK">Hønefoss</a> were relegated to the <a href="2016%202.%20divisjon">2016 2. divisjon</a>.
<a href="Mj%C3%B8ndalen%20IF">Mjøndalen</a>, and <a href="Sandefjord%20Fotball">Sandefjord</a>, were relegated from the <a href="2015%20Tippeligaen">2015 Tippeligaen</a>, while <a href="KFUM-Kameratene%20Oslo">KFUM Oslo</a>, <a href="Raufoss%20IL">Raufoss</a>, <a href="Ullensaker/Kisa%20IL">Ull/Kisa</a> and <a href="Kongsvinger%20IL%20Toppfotball">Kongsvinger</a> were promoted from the <a href="2015%202.%20divisjon">2015 2. divisjon</a>.
Table.
<onlyinclude></onlyinclude>
Promotion play-offs.
The third to sixth-placed teams took part in the promotion play-offs; these were single leg knockout matches, two semi-finals and a final. The winners, <a href="FK%20Jerv">Jerv</a>, advanced to play <a href="Stab%C3%A6k%20Fotball">Stabæk</a> over two legs in the <a href="2016%20Tippeligaen%23Relegation%20play-offs">Tippeligaen play-offs</a> for a spot in the top-flight next season.
